Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor and Waterfront Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets up a mystery involving suspicious activities at the waterfront, leading to his transformation and initial confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of the Human Meteor
sub_scenes.description: The comic cover introduces the Human Meteor and his underwater setting, hinting at the protagonist's powers and the initial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, takes suspicious passengers to the waterfront and notices he is being followed. This leads to his transformation into the Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Hospital Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the sedan occupants, leading to a fight and police intervention. Duke ends up in the hospital where a police officer reveals suspicions about a yacht and a person named Holder.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht and Underwater Espionage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation of the suspicious yacht 'Marlin', involving Pete/Toby's infiltration, underwater discoveries, and Namor's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Pete boards the yacht, investigates a cabin, finds a depth chart, and is attacked and thrown overboard, revealing his undercover mission as 'Toby'.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Mission and Enemy Submarine
sub_scenes.description: Toby receives mission orders, dives underwater, and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine being resupplied with torpedoes by enemy divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Conflict and Namor's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Toby fights enemy divers underwater as their submarine prepares to escape. Tentacles suddenly intervene, and Namor enters the scene to attack the submarine and ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Namor surfaces, learns of Peter's death, discovers a depth map in Peter's cabin proving his treachery, and then visits Toby in the hospital, leading to a reflection on the day's events.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and Garage Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads' fight against Nazi fiends and transitions to a garage setting where boys stumble upon a Nazi spy ring, leading to danger and confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads battle Nazi enemies, and then two boys observe an ambulance arrival, leading to the discovery of a dropped wallet.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies
Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man
The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address
The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Capture
sub_scenes.description: The boys arrive at the garage, encounter a police officer, and are led inside where they are suddenly captured by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Spy Ring Bust
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the attack on the Marine Barracks by Nazi spies, the defense by Major Bronson and the boys, and the ultimate victory of the Marines in dismantling a Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape the garage, seek help, and discover sabotage plans in a secret office, revealing a Nazi spy operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Under Siege
sub_scenes.description: The Marine Barracks is attacked by Nazi spies. Skip defends himself with books, and Major Bronson arrives amidst the chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Counterattack and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive to counterattack. Major Bronson is injured, but the Marines successfully capture the spies and dismantle the Nazi spy ring, leading to celebration.

Major_Arcs.title: South American Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry's adventure in South America, where they get ambushed and become involved in rescuing President Rosita's kidnapped daughter from El Tigre and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a desert landscape and arrive in a South American town, where soldiers are looking for Americans.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are confronted and interrogated by soldiers about President Rosita's daughter's kidnapping. Champ decides to escape and seek help at the American Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul
Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

sub_scenes.title: Mistaken Identity and Rescue Plan
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are captured and mistaken as rescuers by Mama, leading to a plan to find El Tigre and rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Ordeal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan's mission in the jungle, where he is ambushed, captured, tortured, and eventually forms an alliance with natives after a misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and a separate scene where Captain Lawton reveals his son's hostage situation and need for plans.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, and tortured for plans. He eventually submits and hands over the plans to save himself.

sub_scenes.title: Fire, Escape, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan escapes amidst fire, which is intentionally set to burn native huts. He then fights natives but ends up forming an alliance after the chief's death reveals a betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Resolution and Spanking
sub_scenes.description: On a ship, the Captain grapples with Grauer's demands, encounters unexpected figures, engages in a brawl, rescinds orders due to Dolan's actions, and finally spanks Dolan to teach him a lesson about service.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Blood Transfusion Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into a murder case, which leads them to a hospital, a blood transfusion mystery, and ultimately to solving the case and helping a community.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins story and the premise of ordinary people terrorized by ruthless killers.

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office and Police Headquarters
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are briefed at their newspaper office about the Robert Burgess murder and decide to investigate, starting at police headquarters.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case
Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: The Twins go to the hospital to find Tom Reilly's sick child, meet Miss Reilly, and learn about her need for a rare blood type and the name Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly
Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly
Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood
Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section and Murphy's House
sub_scenes.description: The Twins search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section, have an unfruitful inquiry, and then visit Mrs. Murphy's house, learning about Farnacci's deal and the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood
Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession
Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Ambush, Chase, and Community Rescue
sub_scenes.description: An ambush occurs at Murphy's house. Dan chases the shooters, Diane pursues in a taxi, and the community and police respond, leading to the shooters' capture and a medical emergency.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Blood Transfusion and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The injured are taken to the hospital. A community blood drive saves Tom Reilly's life, leading to Farnacci's arrest and a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly, resolving the mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation
